——坚持合作谋实，确保中菲关系根基牢固。菲律宾地理位置得天独厚，是共建“一带一路”的天然伙伴。中方愿同菲方一道，续写古代海上丝绸之路新篇章，推动“一带一路”框架内战略对接，深化经贸、基础设施建设、农业、旅游等各领域互利合作，助力菲律宾实施更多民生项目，让两国民众从合作中不断增强获得感和幸福感。中方愿同菲方持续深化防务、禁毒、反恐、执法合作，为两国发展和地区和平稳定营造良好环境。, ——坚持民心相通，实现中菲关系恒久如一。中菲两国地缘相近、人缘相亲、文缘相通，人民友好交往是两国关系的源头活水。众人拾柴火焰高。我们要推动两国政党、议会、地方、智库往来，加强教育、科技、文化、青年交流，调动更多力量参与两国合作，让中菲友好薪火相传、生生不息。, ——坚持携手共赢，促进东亚合作深入发展。今年是中国同东盟建立战略伙伴关系15周年。菲律宾去年成功举办东亚合作领导人系列会议，今年又接任中国—东盟关系协调国，使命光荣、责任重大。中方坚定支持菲律宾履行协调国职责，愿同菲方携起手来，推动中国—东盟关系优化升级，推动东亚合作得到更大发展。中方将加大对菲律宾首倡的东盟东部增长区投入，进一步提升双方合作，打造同东盟合作新增长点，帮助菲律宾棉兰老岛等地区更好发展。, 40年前，中国开始了改革开放伟大进程。40年众志成城、砥砺奋进，中国人民用双手书写了国家和民族发展的壮丽史诗。中国成为世界第二大经济体、第一大工业国、第一大货物贸易国、第一大外汇储备国，对全球经济增长的贡献率超过30%，实现了联合国标准下7亿多人口稳定脱贫。中国正在全面深化改革、扩大对外开放，我们的改革不会停止、开放不会止步。, 贸易自由化、经济全球化的时代潮流不可阻挡。中国作为负责任大国，坚持合作共赢理念，坚持扩大对外开放，愿同各国分享中国市场的机遇和潜力，刚刚成功举办的首届中国国际进口博览会就是最好证明。中国欢迎菲律宾和更多国家搭乘中国发展的快车。我们将同各国一道，坚定维护以世界贸易组织为核心的多边贸易体制，推动国际政治经济秩序朝着更加公正合理的方向发展。, 数百年前，中国国内生产总值就曾占世界30%，但中国从未对外侵略扩张。1840年鸦片战争后的100多年里，中国频遭侵略蹂躏之害，饱受战祸动乱之苦。孔子说：“己所不欲，勿施于人。”中国人民相信，只有和平安宁，才能发展繁荣。这不是权宜之计，更不是外交辞令，而是思想自信和实践自觉的有机统一。我们将坚持和平发展道路，始终做世界和亚太地区的和平稳定之锚。, 菲律宾谚语说：“抓住今天，才能不丢失明天。”中方愿同菲方把握机遇、顺势而上，传承和发扬崇尚和平、讲信修睦的亚洲传统，巩固和发展好两国关系，携手开创两国和亚洲更加美好的明天！, （新华社北京11月19日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2018年11月20日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平：共同开辟中菲关系新未来

eng: [, Dear Prime Minister O’Neill, Dear Colleagues,, It’s a pleasure to be here with you all in the beautiful Port Moresby. For the first time, APEC member leaders gathered in the Pacific Island Countries area, focusing on the theme of "Capturing Inclusive Opportunities and Embracing the Digital Future" to review the history of cooperation and discuss the Asia-Pacific vision. I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to the Papua New Guinea Government, especially Prime Minister O’Neill for their efforts in preparing for this meeting! In today's world, development and change are surging. New technological revolutions and industrial changes have developed in depth, the global governance system has been profoundly reshaped, and the international landscape has accelerated. At the same time, deep-seated contradictions in global development are prominent, protectionism and unilateralism are on the rise, the multilateral trading system has been hit, and the overall development environment of the world economy is facing many risks and uncertainties. , "The wise man seeks in time." Standing at the crossroads of historical progress, we should recognize the general trend of the world, grasp the economic pulse, clarify the future direction, and answer the proposition of the times. First, insist on promoting regional economic integration and building an open Asia-Pacific economy. We should continue to promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation. The road to the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area will not be smooth, but we must always move in this general direction and goal. For all kinds of free trade arrangements, we should adhere to the principles of openness, inclusiveness and transparency, and promote coordination with each other to achieve benign interaction. We should firmly maintain the rules-based multilateral trading system and clearly resist protectionism. The World Trade Organization is exploring a new round of reform. The purpose of the reform should be to make it work better and adhere to the core values ​​and basic principles of the multilateral trading system, rather than reinvent the wheel. We should guide economic globalization to develop in a more open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced, and win-win direction. This year is the 40th anniversary of China's reform and opening up. China will unswervingly deepen reforms comprehensively, accelerate the improvement of the socialist market economic system, and build a modern economic system. China will adhere to the basic national policy of opening up to the outside world, substantially relax market access, increase the protection of intellectual property rights, and create a more attractive investment and business environment. A week ago, the first China International Import Expo was successfully held in Shanghai, attracting 172 countries, regions and international organizations, more than 3,600 enterprises participated in the exhibition, more than 400,000 domestic and foreign buyers attended the meeting to negotiate purchases, and the turnover reached 57.8 billion US dollars. More than 4500 celebrities from all walks of life attended the Hongqiao International Economic and Trade Forum. This shows once again that China’s determination to support free and open trade and to actively open the market to the world will not be shaken. Second, adhere to the innovation drive and cultivate new growth momentum. The digital economy is the future development direction of Asia-Pacific and even the world. We should firmly grasp the trend of the era of innovation and development, fully implement the "Internet and Digital Economy Roadmap", and unlock the growth potential of the digital economy. At the same time, we should strengthen digital infrastructure and capacity building, increase the accessibility of the digital economy, bridge the digital divide, allow members at different stages of development to share the achievements of the digital economy, and let the people of the Asia-Pacific region catch the digital economy. , China is vigorously building a "Digital China" and has harvested a number of innovations in the fields of "Internet +" and artificial intelligence. New technologies, new business models and new models such as sharing economy, online retail, and mobile payment are constantly emerging, which has profoundly changed the lives of Chinese people. China is willing to deepen digital economic cooperation with all parties in the Asia-Pacific region, cultivate more points of interest and economic growth, and inject strong new momentum into the Asia-Pacific economy. Thirdly, insist on improving the interconnected network to promote inclusive and joint development. Interconnection is the basis for inclusive and joint development. We should thoroughly implement the blueprint for interconnection and interconnection, so that Unicom's network can cover every corner of the Pacific coast. We should take the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development as the guide and take more pragmatic measures to make development more balanced, more sustainable growth, more equal opportunities, and more inclusive society. , China attaches great importance to the construction of interconnection. After five years of hard work, the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” is entering a new stage of in-depth development. In April next year, China will host the second "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. China will work with other countries to insist on mutual consultation, joint construction and sharing, high-quality, high-standard, and high-level construction of the “Belt and Road”, creating greater development opportunities for people in the Asia-Pacific and the world. , Fourth, insist on deepening partnership and work together to meet common challenges. APEC has gone through nearly 30 years of cooperation, and the partnership of mutual trust, tolerance, cooperation and win-win has become our common wealth. The national conditions of Asia-Pacific countries vary greatly, and it is not surprising that there are differences. The key is to adhere to the common development of this convention, carry forward the spirit of partnership, negotiate differences, and explore and solve common challenges. We should base ourselvesNot surprisingly. The key is to adhere to the common development of this convention, carry forward the spirit of partnership, negotiate differences, and explore and solve common challenges. We should base ourselves on the reality of diversity, respect each other's choice of development path, blend and learn from each other on an open and inclusive basis, cooperate with each other while benign competition, and jointly build a community of shared destiny in Asia and the Pacific. , China adheres to the people-centered development concept and practices the new development concept of innovation, coordination, greenness, openness and sharing. Over the past few decades, more than 700 million people in China have been lifted out of poverty, and they will alleviate poverty by 2020. The contribution rate of the Chinese economy to world economic growth has been maintained at over 30%. At the same time, it is accelerating from rapid growth to high-quality development. This year, consumption has contributed 78% to China's economic growth. The overall momentum of China’s long-term economic stability will continue. , Colleagues! As leaders of the Asia-Pacific region, we have a responsibility to ascend our horizons and plan the cooperation vision of APEC after 2020. We should follow the trend of economic globalization and not be blocked by temporary difficulties, continue to uphold the purpose of promoting regional economic integration, grasp the general direction of building an open world economy, and strive to maintain the momentum of Asia-Pacific cooperation and steadily move to a higher level. , China is an active advocate and firm practitioner of Asia-Pacific cooperation. China's development is inseparable from close cooperation with all parties in the Asia-Pacific region, and it also expands vast space for Asia-Pacific development. China will deeply participate in the Asia-Pacific cooperation process, increase investment, deepen practical cooperation with all parties, and make new contributions to the development and prosperity of the Asia-Pacific region! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Port Moresby, November 18th), "People's Daily" (November 19, 2018, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Seize the opportunity of the times and seek prosperity in the Asia-Pacific
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-11-19
text: [, 尊敬的奥尼尔总理，, 各位同事：, 很高兴同大家相聚在美丽的莫尔兹比港。亚太经合组织成员领导人首次在太平洋岛国地区聚首，围绕“把握包容性机遇，拥抱数字化未来”的主题，回顾合作历程，共商亚太愿景。我谨对巴布亚新几内亚政府特别是奥尼尔总理为筹备本次会议付出的努力，表示衷心的感谢！, 当今世界，发展和变革风起云涌。新科技革命和产业变革深入发展，全球治理体系深刻重塑，国际格局加速演变。同时，全球发展深层次矛盾突出，保护主义、单边主义思潮抬头，多边贸易体制受到冲击，世界经济整体发展环境面临诸多风险和不确定性。, “智者顺时而谋。”站在历史前进的十字路口，我们应该认清世界大势，把握经济脉动，明确未来方向，解答时代命题。, 第一，坚持推进区域经济一体化，构建开放型亚太经济。我们应该持续推进贸易和投资自由化便利化。通往亚太自由贸易区的路途不会平坦，但我们要始终朝着这个大方向、大目标迈进。对各类自由贸易安排，我们应该坚持开放、包容、透明原则，促进彼此协调，实现良性互动。我们应坚定维护以规则为基础的多边贸易体制，旗帜鲜明抵制保护主义。世界贸易组织正在探讨新一轮改革，改革的目的应该是让其更好发挥作用，坚持多边贸易体制的核心价值和基本原则，而不是推倒重来。我们应该引导经济全球化朝着更加开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的方向发展。, 今年是中国改革开放40周年。中国将坚定不移全面深化改革，加快完善社会主义市场经济体制，建设现代化经济体系。中国将坚持对外开放基本国策，大幅度放宽市场准入，加大保护知识产权力度，创造更具吸引力的投资和营商环境。一周前，首届中国国际进口博览会在上海成功举行，吸引了172个国家、地区和国际组织，3600多家企业参展，40多万名境内外采购商到会洽谈采购，成交额达到578亿美元。4500多名各界知名人士出席虹桥国际经贸论坛。这再次表明，中国支持自由开放贸易、主动向世界开放市场的决心不会有任何动摇。, 第二，坚持创新驱动，培育增长新动能。数字经济是亚太乃至全球未来的发展方向。我们应该牢牢把握创新发展时代潮流，全面平衡落实《互联网和数字经济路线图》，释放数字经济增长潜能。同时，我们应该加强数字基础设施和能力建设，增强数字经济可及性，消弭数字鸿沟，让处于不同发展阶段的成员共享数字经济发展成果，让亚太地区人民搭上数字经济发展快车。, 中国正在大力建设“数字中国”，在“互联网+”、人工智能等领域收获一批创新成果。分享经济、网络零售、移动支付等新技术新业态新模式不断涌现，深刻改变了中国老百姓生活。中国愿同亚太各方深化数字经济合作，培育更多利益契合点和经济增长点，为亚太经济注入强大新动能。, 第三，坚持完善互联互通网络，促进包容联动发展。互联互通是实现包容联动发展的基础。我们应该深入落实互联互通蓝图，让联通的网络覆盖太平洋沿岸的每一个角落。我们应该以2030年可持续发展议程为引领，采取更多务实举措，让发展更加均衡、增长更可持续、机会更加平等、社会更加包容。, 中国高度重视互联互通建设。经过5年努力，共建“一带一路”正进入深入发展新阶段。明年4月，中国将主办第二届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛。中国将同各国一道，坚持共商共建共享，高质量、高标准、高水平建设“一带一路”，为亚太和世界各国人民创造更大发展机遇。, 第四，坚持深化伙伴关系，携手应对共同挑战。亚太经合组织走过近30年合作历程，互信、包容、合作、共赢的伙伴关系已经成为我们的共同财富。亚太各国国情千差万别，有分歧并不奇怪。关键是要坚持共谋发展这个公约数，发扬伙伴精神，协商处理分歧，探索解决共同挑战。我们应该立足多样性实际，尊重彼此选择的发展道路，在开放包容的基础上交融互鉴，在良性竞争的同时互利合作，共同构建亚太命运共同体。, 中国坚持以人民为中心的发展思想，践行创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的新发展理念。过去几十年，中国7亿多人口摆脱贫困，将在2020年实现全面脱贫。中国经济对世界经济增长的贡献率一直保持在30%以上。同时正在加快从高速增长转向高质量发展。今年，消费对中国经济增长的贡献达到78%。中国经济长期稳定向好的总体势头会继续保持下去。, 各位同事！, 作为亚太地区领导人，我们有责任登高望远，规划好亚太经合组织2020年后的合作愿景。我们应该顺应经济全球化发展大势，不为一时的困难所阻挡，继续秉持推动区域经济一体化宗旨，把握构建开放型世界经济大方向，努力保持亚太合作势头，稳步迈向更高水平。, 中国是亚太合作的积极倡导者和坚定践行者。中国的发展离不开同亚太各方的紧密合作，也为亚太发展拓展了广阔空间。中国将深入参与亚太合作进程，加大投入，同各方深化务实合作，为亚太地区发展繁荣作出新贡献！, 谢谢大家。, （新华社莫尔兹比港11月18日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2018年11月19日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：把握时代机遇 共谋亚太繁荣

eng: [, November 17, on the eve of a state visit to Brunei Darussalam, State President Xi Jinping published in Brunei's "Borneo Bulletin", "Shihua Daily", "Lianhe Daily" and "Sin Chew Daily" A signed article entitled "Working Together to Write the Xinhua Chapter of China-Brunei Relations". The article is as follows:, Working together to write the Xinhua chapter of China-Brunei relations, President Xi Jinping of the People's Republic of China, at the invitation of His Majesty Sultan Hassanal, I will pay a state visit to Brunei from November 18 to 20. This is my first visit to your country, and I am very happy about this trip. , The name of the country of Brunei means "a state of peace". There are beautiful natural scenery, rich urban style, and peaceful social atmosphere here, just like the paradise described by the ancient Chinese poet Tao Yuanming. In recent years, under the excellent leadership of His Majesty the Sultan, Brunei has embarked on a development path that suits its national conditions. The country is prosperous and prosperous, and the people live and work in peace and contentment. I sincerely wish Brunei greater achievements in development. , China and China are friendly neighbors across the sea. Brunei has been an important part of the Maritime Silk Road since ancient times. As early as the Western Han Dynasty in China, our ancestors communicated with each other through this maritime bond, and wrote a beautiful chapter of knowing each other and meeting each other. Zheng He led the fleet through Brunei twice, bringing peace and friendship to the local people, and was kindly called "Marshal Zheng He" by the Brunei people. The "Zhongbingbing Road" and the Tomb of Dandelion in Sri Baga Bay City, and the Tomb of King Mu Ni in Nanjing, China, have witnessed the long history of friendly exchanges between the two countries. , In 1991, China formally established diplomatic relations with Brunei, and the "leading edge" of the two countries for thousands of years was renewed. Over the past five years since the two sides established a strategic cooperative relationship, mutual political trust has continued to deepen, pragmatic cooperation has steadily advanced, and they have supported and cooperated with each other in international and regional affairs. The Chinese relationship has entered the best period in history and has become a model for countries of all sizes to treat each other as equals, for mutual benefit and win-win progress and common development. The initiative to co-construct the “Belt and Road” initiative received positive response and strong support from Brunei. The two sides signed a memorandum of understanding to promote the integration of this initiative with Brunei’s “Vision 2035” and inject new impetus into the development of bilateral relations. This year, the economic and trade cooperation between the two countries has expanded rapidly. China has become one of Brunei's most important partners. The two flagship cooperation projects of Hengyi Brunei Petrochemical and the "Guangxi-Brunei Economic Corridor" have proceeded smoothly. The increasing number of Chinese companies investing in Brunei's business has played an active role in Brunei's economic diversification. Chinese companies have actively participated in the construction of Brunei’s infrastructure, and have undertaken projects such as the Great Mora Island Bridge, the Trice-Rumu Expressway, and the Uludu East Dam, which has raised the level of Brunei’s interconnectivity and has become a beautiful place in Brunei. "Chinese business card". , Humanities exchanges between the two countries are becoming more frequent. China is Brunei’s largest source of tourists, and Chinese tourists can be seen on the streets of Sri Baga Bay from time to time. The two countries have opened direct air routes from Sri Baga Bay City to Hong Kong, Shanghai, Hangzhou, Nanning, and Kunming, which has established an air corridor for personnel exchanges. As the friendship cities of Nanjing and Sri Baga Bay frequently move around, the friendship between the people of the two countries has shown new vitality. This year marks the 40th anniversary of China's reform and opening up, and the 5th anniversary of the proposal to jointly build the “Belt and Road” initiative. China will insist on opening up to the outside world and promote the “Belt and Road” to go deeper and better, so as to better benefit the people along the route. At present, China and Brunei are in the critical period of achieving the "two hundred years" struggle goals and the realization of the "2035 vision". Both parties should deepen understanding, enhance friendship, deepen cooperation, and promote the development of Chinese relations. , ——We want to enhance mutual political trust. Both sides should plan for the development of Chinese relations from a strategic and long-term perspective, maintain high-level exchanges, increase political mutual trust, and push bilateral relations to a new level. China respects and firmly supports Brunei's development path in line with its national conditions. , ——We must deepen pragmatic cooperation. The two sides should strengthen strategic integration, and China is willing to continue to provide assistance to Brunei to achieve economic diversification, build key cooperation projects, and explore cooperation in the fields of energy, infrastructure, agriculture and fisheries, e-commerce, and offshore. China will encourage Chinese companies to invest in Brunei and welcome Brunei to expand the export of high-quality products to China. , ——We want to deepen cultural exchanges. Both sides should expand exchanges and cooperation in culture, health, education, sports, tourism, human resources training and other fields. We support the airline companies of the two countries to open more direct flights, encourage more Chinese tourists to visit Brunei, and welcome more Brunei friends to study, travel and work in China. -We must strengthen coordination and cooperation in international and regional affairs. China is willing to work with Brunei to promote the in-depth development of China-ASEAN cooperation in various fields, accelerate the process of negotiating regional comprehensive economic partnership agreements, and promote ChinaTogether. China is willing to work with the Brunei side to promote the in-depth development of China-ASEAN cooperation in various fields, accelerate the negotiation process of the regional comprehensive economic partnership agreement, promote the achievement of the China-ASEAN free trade zone upgrade as soon as possible, and support the Brunei side to play a greater role in the ASEAN growth zone effect. China is willing to join hands with the Liberal side to safeguard multilateralism, the international trading system, and the legitimate rights and interests of developing countries and contribute to regional peace, stability, and prosperity. , Brunei has a proverb: "Without mutual understanding, it is not possible to build a deep friendship." The Chinese said: "The acquaintances of people, know each other." We are willing to be a good friend and a good partner for common development with Brunei . I believe that with the joint efforts of the governments and peoples of the two countries, the friendly and cooperative relations in Chinese will surely write a better chapter! (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 17th), "People's Daily" (November 18, 2018, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in Brunei media
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-11-18
text: [, 　　11月17日，在对文莱达鲁萨兰国进行国事访问前夕，国家主席习近平在文莱《婆罗洲公报》、《诗华日报》、《联合日报》、《星洲日报》发表题为《携手谱写中国同文莱关系新华章》的署名文章。文章如下：, 　　携手谱写中国同文莱关系新华章, 　　中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 　　应哈桑纳尔苏丹陛下邀请，我将于11月18日至20日对文莱进行国事访问。这是我首次访问贵国，我对此行感到十分高兴。, 　　文莱国名寓意“和平之邦”。这里有旖旎的自然风光、浓郁的城市风情、祥和的社会氛围，仿佛中国古代诗人陶渊明笔下的世外桃源。近年来，在苏丹陛下卓越领导下，文莱走出一条符合本国国情的发展道路，国家繁荣富足，人民安居乐业。我衷心祝愿文莱取得更大发展成就。, 　　中文两国是隔海相望的友好邻邦。文莱自古便是海上丝绸之路的重要组成部分。早在中国西汉时期，我们的祖先就通过这条海上纽带互通有无，谱写了相知相交相亲的美好篇章。郑和率领船队两次途经文莱，给当地人民带来了和平与友谊，被文莱民间亲切称作“郑和元帅”。斯里巴加湾市的“王总兵路”和蒲公墓，中国南京市的浡泥国王墓，都见证了两国悠久的友好交往历史。, 　　1991年，中国同文莱正式建立外交关系，两国绵延千年的“前缘”得以重续。双方建立战略合作关系5年来，政治互信不断深化，务实合作稳步推进，在国际和地区事务中相互支持和配合。中文关系步入历史最好时期，成为大小国家平等相待、互利共赢、共同发展的典范。, 　　我提出的共建“一带一路”倡议得到文莱方面积极响应和大力支持，双方签署谅解备忘录，推动这一倡议同文莱“2035宏愿”对接，为两国关系发展注入了新动力。, 　　今年来，两国经贸合作快速拓展。中国已成为文莱最重要的合作伙伴之一。恒逸文莱石化、“广西—文莱经济走廊”两大旗舰合作项目顺利推进。来文莱投资兴业的中国企业日益增多，为文莱经济多元化发展发挥了积极作用。中国企业积极参与文莱基础设施建设，承建了大摩拉岛大桥、特里塞—鲁木高速公路、乌鲁都东水坝等工程，提升了文莱互联互通水平，也成为文莱当地靓丽的“中国名片”。, 　　两国人文交流日益频繁。中国是文莱第一大游客来源国，斯里巴加湾市街头不时可以看到中国游客的身影。两国开通斯里巴加湾市至香港、上海、杭州、南宁、昆明的直航航线，为人员往来架起了空中走廊。南京市和斯里巴加湾市作为友城频繁走动，中文两国人民情谊焕发出新的蓬勃生机。, 　　今年是中国改革开放40周年，也是共建“一带一路”倡议提出5周年。中方将坚持对外开放，推动“一带一路”走深走实，更好造福沿线国家人民。当前，中国和文莱分别处于实现“两个一百年”奋斗目标和实现“2035宏愿”的关键时期，双方应该加深了解，增进友谊，深化合作，推动中文关系更好向前发展。, 　　——我们要提升政治互信。双方要从战略高度和长远角度对中文关系发展作出规划，保持高层交往，增进政治互信，推动双边关系迈上新台阶。中方尊重并坚定支持文莱走符合本国国情的发展道路。, 　　——我们要深耕务实合作。双方要加强战略对接，中方愿继续为文莱实现经济多元化提供助力，建设好重点合作项目，探讨能源、基建、农渔业、电子商务以及海上等领域合作。中方将鼓励中国企业赴文莱投资，欢迎文莱扩大优质产品对华出口。, 　　——我们要深化人文交流。双方要拓展文化、卫生、教育、体育、旅游、人力资源培训等领域交流合作。我们支持两国航空企业开通更多直航，鼓励更多中国游客赴文莱观光，欢迎更多文莱朋友到中国留学、旅游、工作。, 　　——我们要加强在国际和地区事务中的协作和配合。中方愿同文方一道，推动中国—东盟各领域合作深入发展，加快区域全面经济伙伴关系协定谈判进程，推动中国—东盟自由贸易区升级成果尽早落地，支持文方在东盟东部增长区中发挥更大作用。中方愿同文方携手维护多边主义、国际贸易体系、发展中国家正当权益，为地区和平、稳定、繁荣作出贡献。, 　　文莱有句谚语：“没有相互了解，就不能建立深厚情谊。”中国人讲：“人之相识，贵在相知。”我们愿同文莱做真诚相待的好朋友、共同发展的好伙伴。相信在两国政府和人民共同努力下，中文友好合作关系必将谱写出更加美好的篇章！（新华社北京11月17日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2018年11月18日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在文莱媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, November 14th, on the eve of a state visit to the independent country of Papua New Guinea, President Xi Jinping published in Papua New Guinea’s Courier Post and National Daily entitled "Let China Sail the Pacific Island ”Signed articles. The article is as follows: Let China and the Pacific island countries set sail and set sail again, President Xi Jinping of the People's Republic of China, I will soon pay a state visit to the famous "Bird of Paradise" Papua New Guinea, and attend the second APEC held in Papua New Guinea Sixteen informal meetings of leaders. This will be my first visit to Papua New Guinea and the first Chinese State President's state visit to Papua New Guinea. I am looking forward to this. Papua New Guinea is the largest Pacific island country with the largest population. It is rich in natural resources and has huge development potential. It is a hot spot full of hope. In recent years, under the leadership of Prime Minister O’Neill, the government and people of Papua New Guinea have been aggressive and striving for prosperity, national development has prospered, and the social outlook has been refreshed. I sincerely wish Papua New Guinea to continuously achieve new and greater achievements on the road of national construction and economic and social development, and I wish Papua New Guinea a successful success in hosting the APEC Leaders’ Informal Meeting. The friendly exchanges between China and Papua New Guinea have a long history. As early as more than 100 years ago, Chinese people came here to cross the ocean, rooted in the local area, worked hard, and made important contributions to the economic and social development of Papua New Guinea. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries in 1976, the two sides have adhered to mutual respect, treating each other as equals, and achieving mutual benefit and win-win results. The relationship between China and Papua New Guinea has withstood the test of international changes and has lasted forever. In recent years, relations between the two countries have entered a new stage of rapid development. PNG is China's largest trading partner in the Pacific Island Countries, and China has become the largest source of foreign investment and the largest project contractor in PNG. China’s aided Independence Avenue and International Conference Center will play an important role in hosting the APEC leaders’ informal meeting; the Chinese medical team will provide humanitarian medical services to the people of Papua New Guinea for 16 years; use Chinese government preferential loans The constructed hydropower stations, hospitals, and school buildings have become new landmarks throughout Papua New Guinea; Chinese companies have actively responded to the "2030 Development Strategy" proposed by the Papua New Guinea government and participated in the construction of highways, bridges, airports, and docks throughout Papua New Guinea. 18 years ago, during my tenure as governor of Fujian Province in China, I had promoted the implementation of a demonstration project on the cultivation of fungus and upland rice by the Fujian Province to assist the Papua New Zealand. I am happy to learn that this project has continued to operate so far and has played a very good economic and social benefit, which has become a good story for the development of China-Papua New Guinea relations. , I look forward to working with Papua New Guinea through this visit to increase mutual trust, expand pragmatic cooperation, expand cultural exchanges, and push China-Papua New Guinea relations to a new level. The rapid development of China-Pakistan-New Zealand relations is the epitome of the overall development of China’s relations with Pacific island countries. Four years ago, I held a collective meeting with the leaders of the eight Pacific island countries that established diplomatic relations in Nadi, Fiji. All parties unanimously agreed to establish a strategic partnership of mutual respect and common development. The relationship between China and the island countries has entered a new historical period and rejuvenated. Vitality. In promoting the development of bilateral relations, China and island countries adhere to the following principles. , ——Insist on mutual respect. China and the island nation regard each other as sincere friends and friendly partners. China insists on equality between large and small countries, firmly supports the people of island countries in taking a development path that suits their national conditions, and supports island countries in playing their due role in international affairs. The island nation has long given China valuable support on issues involving China's core interests and major concerns. , ——Insist on deepening cooperation. China's economic and trade exchanges with island countries are becoming closer, economic and technological cooperation is deepening, and the cake of common interests is constantly growing. Special commodities such as LNG from Papua New Guinea, mineral water from Fiji, pumpkins from Tonga and tuna from the Federated States of Micronesia have successfully entered the Chinese market. China provides support and assistance to the development and construction of island countries within its capacity, and has contributed to the promotion of the economic development of island countries and the well-being of the people. , ——Insist on the common people. The average number of Chinese tourists to islands exceeds 100,000 annually. A large number of young students, government officials, and technicians from island countries came to China to study, study, and study. The cultural and art troupes of both sides exchange and exchange visits frequently. The Chinese Navy’s “Peace Ark” hospital ship visited Papua New Guinea, Fiji, Tonga and Vanuatu and provided humanitarian diagnosis and treatment services to more than 20,000 island people. "We don't know each other far and wide, and thousands of miles are still neighbors." Facts have proved that the vast Pacific Ocean is the link between China and the island countries. Looking at the whole world, a new round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial transformation are developing in depth. How to seize opportunities, overcome difficulties and accelerate development is a common historical task for China and island countries, and a common good for both peoples.With the in-depth development of industry reform, how to seize opportunities, overcome difficulties and accelerate development is a common historical task for China and island countries, and a common wish of both peoples. During this visit to Papua New Guinea, I once again invited the leaders of the eight Pacific island countries that established diplomatic relations to gather in Papua New Guinea to discuss friendship, discuss development plans, and let China and the island nations set sail again. First, strategic mutual trust must reach a new level. China will stand firmly with developing countries including Pacific island countries. The Chinese side will uphold the true and sincere concept and the correct concept of justice and benefit to strengthen solidarity and cooperation with Pacific island countries, support the development of island countries, and promote the reduction of the North-South development gap. China is willing to work with island nations to promote the construction of a new type of international relations and a community with a shared future for mankind. Second, common development must add new impetus. China is willing to expand pragmatic cooperation with island countries in trade and investment, and welcomes Pacific island countries to actively participate in the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” in accordance with their own conditions and advantages, combined with their own development strategies and plans. It is believed that the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” will provide a new path for China to strengthen economic and trade ties and interconnections between island countries, various island countries, and other countries in the world, and to better participate in the process of economic globalization. Thirdly, the people's friendship must write a new chapter. The island state has a proverb: "Friendship is a canal in the desert." We are willing to continue to expand exchanges and cooperation in the fields of culture, education, health, sports, youth, locality, human resources training and other fields with the island country, and welcome more friends from Pacific island countries to China for sightseeing 1. Studying abroad, investing in business, investigating and visiting, deepening mutual understanding and friendship between the people of the two sides, and spreading the friendship between the two sides. During my visit to Papua New Guinea, I will also attend the 26th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting. This is the first time that Papua New Guinea and Pacific island countries host an informal meeting of APEC leaders. It can be said that it is a grand event for the entire island country. I look forward to working with all members to focus on the theme of "Capturing Inclusive Opportunities and Embracing the Digital Future", and to conduct in-depth exchanges on important topics such as regional economic integration, digital economy, interconnection, sustainability, and inclusive growth. Make new contributions to stability and development. At present, the development of relations between China and Pacific island countries is at the best period in history and is facing important development opportunities. China is willing to work with Pacific island countries to ride the wind and waves and set sail towards a better tomorrow for the relationship between the two sides! , (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 14th), "People's Daily" (November 15, 2018, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in Papua New Guinea media
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-11-15
text: [, 11月14日，在对巴布亚新几内亚独立国进行国事访问前夕，国家主席习近平在巴布亚新几内亚《信使邮报》、《国民报》发表题为《让中国同太平洋岛国关系扬帆再启航》的署名文章。文章如下：, 让中国同太平洋岛国关系扬帆再启航, 中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 我即将对著名的“天堂鸟之国”巴布亚新几内亚进行国事访问，并出席在巴新举行的亚太经合组织第二十六次领导人非正式会议。这将是我首次到访巴新，也是中国国家主席首次对巴新进行国事访问。我对此充满期待。, 巴新是面积最大、人口最多的太平洋岛国，自然资源丰富，发展潜力巨大，是一片充满希望的热土。近年来，在奥尼尔总理领导下，巴新政府和人民积极进取、奋发图强，国家发展欣欣向荣，社会面貌焕然一新。我衷心祝愿巴新在国家建设和经济社会发展的道路上不断取得新的更大成就，预祝巴新这次主办亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议获得圆满成功。, 中国同巴新友好交往源远流长。早在100多年前就有华人漂洋过海来到这里，扎根当地、辛勤劳动，为巴新经济社会发展作出了重要贡献。1976年两国建交以来，双方坚持相互尊重、平等相待、互利共赢，中国同巴新关系经受住了国际风云变幻考验，历久弥新。, 近年来，两国关系进入了快速发展的新阶段。巴新是中国在太平洋岛国地区第一大贸易伙伴，中国成为巴新第一大外资来源地和第一大工程承包方。中国援建的独立大道、国际会议中心将为巴新主办这次亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议发挥重要作用；中国医疗队16年如一日为巴新民众提供人道主义医疗服务；使用中国政府优惠贷款建设的水电站、医院、校舍成为巴新各地的新地标；中国公司积极响应巴新政府提出的“2030发展战略”，在巴新全国参与建设公路、桥梁、机场、码头。, 18年前，我担任中国福建省省长期间，曾推动实施福建省援助巴新东高地省菌草、旱稻种植技术示范项目。我高兴地得知，这一项目持续运作至今，发挥了很好的经济社会效益，成为中国同巴新关系发展的一段佳话。, 我期待着通过这次访问，同巴新方一道努力，增进相互信任，拓展务实合作，扩大人文交流，推动中国同巴新关系再上新台阶。, 中国同巴新关系的迅速发展，是中国同太平洋岛国整体关系发展的缩影。4年前，我在斐济楠迪同8个建交太平洋岛国领导人举行集体会晤，各方一致同意建立相互尊重、共同发展的战略伙伴关系，中国同岛国关系进入了新的历史时期，焕发出新的勃勃生机。中国和岛国在推动双边关系发展实践中，坚持了以下原则。, ——坚持相互尊重。中国和岛国视彼此为真诚朋友和友好伙伴。中方坚持大小国家一律平等，坚定支持岛国人民走符合自身国情的发展道路，支持岛国在国际事务中发挥应有作用。岛国在涉及中国核心利益和重大关切问题上长期给予中方宝贵支持。, ——坚持深化合作。中国同岛国经贸交往日益密切，经济技术合作更加深入，共同利益的蛋糕不断做大。巴新的液化天然气、斐济的矿泉水、汤加的南瓜、密克罗尼西亚联邦的金枪鱼等特色商品已经成功进入中国市场。中国在力所能及范围内为岛国发展建设提供支持和援助，为促进岛国经济发展、增进人民福祉作出了贡献。, ——坚持民心相通。中国赴岛国游客年均超过10万人次。大量岛国青年学生、政府官员、技术人员到中国学习深造、考察研修。双方文艺团组交流互访频繁。中国海军“和平方舟”医院船访问巴新、斐济、汤加、瓦努阿图，为2万多名岛国民众提供了人道主义诊疗服务。, “相知无远近，万里尚为邻。”事实证明，浩瀚的太平洋是中国同岛国关系发展的纽带。放眼全球，新一轮科技革命和产业变革深入发展，如何把握机遇、共克时艰、加快发展，是中国和岛国共同的历史任务，也是双方人民共同的美好心愿。这次访问巴新期间，我再次邀请8个建交太平洋岛国领导人在巴新相聚，共叙友好情谊，共商发展大计，让中国同岛国关系扬帆再启航。, 第一，战略互信要再上新台阶。中国将同包括太平洋岛国在内的广大发展中国家坚定站在一起。中方将秉持真实亲诚理念和正确义利观加强同太平洋岛国的团结合作，支持岛国发展，促进缩小南北发展差距。中国愿和岛国共同推动构建新型国际关系，推动构建人类命运共同体。, 第二，共同发展要再添新动力。中方愿扩大同岛国在贸易和投资等领域务实合作，欢迎太平洋岛国根据自身条件和优势，结合本国发展战略和规划积极参与共建“一带一路”。相信共建“一带一路”将为中国同岛国、各个岛国之间以及岛国同世界其他国家加强经贸联系和互联互通、更好参与经济全球化进程提供新的路径。, 第三，人民友谊要再谱新篇章。岛国有句谚语：“友谊是沙漠中的水渠。”我们愿同岛国不断扩大文化、教育、卫生、体育、青年、地方、人力资源培训等领域交流合作，欢迎更多太平洋岛国朋友到中国旅游观光、留学深造、投资经商、考察访问，加深双方人民相互了解和友谊，让双方友好事业薪火相传。, 我这次访问巴新期间还将出席亚太经合组织第二十六次领导人非正式会议。这是巴新也是太平洋岛国首次主办亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议，可以说是整个岛国地区的一件盛事。我期待着同各成员一道，聚焦“把握包容性机遇，拥抱数字化未来”主题，就区域经济一体化、数字经济、互联互通、可持续和包容增长等重要议题进行深入交流，为本地区和平、稳定、发展作出新贡献。, 当前，中国同太平洋岛国关系发展正处于历史最好时期，面临重要发展机遇。中国愿同太平洋岛国一道努力，乘风破浪，向着双方关系更加美好的明天扬帆再启航！, （新华社北京11月14日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2018年11月15日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在巴布亚新几内亚媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, Dear President Putin, Dear colleagues from various countries, Ladies, gentlemen, friends:, I am very happy to visit Vladivostok again after an interval of 8 years. First of all, I would like to sincerely thank President Putin for his kind invitation and thoughtful arrangement of Russian friends. At the initiative of President Putin, the Oriental Economic Forum has been successfully held for three sessions, becoming an important platform for all parties to gather wisdom and discuss cooperation. This year's Oriental Economic Forum was full of guests and unprecedented. On behalf of the Chinese government and the Chinese people, and in my own name, I would like to extend warm congratulations to President Putin and Russian friends! , "Eastern winds are springing." Yesterday, when I got off the plane, I was attracted by the new look of Vladivostok. The rippling Golden Horn Bay is connected, and the Russian Island Bridge is flying north and south, making us feel the rapid development of Vladivostok. The development achievements made by Vladivostok are the epitome of the rapid development of the Russian Far East in recent years. Just like the theme of this year's Oriental Economic Forum-"Far East: More Opportunities", the Far East region has shown vigorous development vitality, providing new opportunities for all parties to come here to invest in business and carry out cooperation. , China has always been an active supporter and participant of Russian Far East cooperation. China and Russia are each other's largest neighbors and have unique geographical advantages for cooperation. China and Russia are each other's comprehensive strategic cooperation partners. The relationship between the two countries is at its best in history and the political foundation for cooperation is solid. China implements a coordinated regional development strategy and accelerates the pace of revitalization of old industrial bases such as the Northeast. Russia has incorporated Far East development into its national development strategy, and the cooperation policy is guaranteed to be strong. The two countries established the Intergovernmental Cooperation Committee of Northeast China and the Russian Far East and Baikal Region, formed the Industrial Council of Northeast China and the Russian Far East and Baikal Region, and held a dialogue between Chinese and Russian local leaders. The cooperation mechanism is complete and efficient. With the joint efforts of both sides, in recent years, China's participation in Russian Far East cooperation has achieved remarkable results. In 2017, China's trade with the Russian Far East Federal District exceeded US$7.7 billion. China has participated in more than 30 projects in the Far East Leapfrog Development Zone and Freeport, with a planned investment of over US$4 billion. China has become the largest trading partner and the largest source of foreign investment in the Russian Far East. China has set up the first phase of China-Russia regional cooperation and development investment fund of 10 billion yuan and a total scale of 100 billion yuan. It is willing to work with Russia to support the operation of the fund, promote the implementation of major projects, and build it into an important platform for China-Russia regional cooperation. . With the smooth progress of a number of major projects such as the Sino-Russian crude oil pipeline, the East Line natural gas pipeline, the Tongjiang Railway Bridge, and the Heihe Highway Bridge, Sino-Russian Far East cooperation will usher in a bumper harvest season. This year and next year will be the year of Sino-Russian local cooperation and exchange determined by President Putin and me, and will open up a wider space for cooperation between the Far East of the two sides. China is willing to work with Russia to expand cooperation in key areas such as infrastructure construction, energy, agriculture, and tourism, widely mobilize the enthusiasm of small and medium-sized enterprises, and strive to increase the technical content and added value of cooperation between the two sides, achieve complementary advantages, mutual benefit and win-win, promote China More cooperation has been achieved in the Russian Far East. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! Under the new situation, we must work together and strengthen cooperation to promote peace, stability, development and prosperity in the region. I would like to share some views with you. , We must increase mutual trust and maintain regional peace and tranquility. At present, the international situation is undergoing profound and complex changes, and power politics, unilateralism and protectionism are on the rise. The population of the six countries of Northeast Asia accounts for 23% of the global population, and the GDP accounts for 19% of the global economy. A harmonious, mutual trust, unity, and stable Northeast Asia is in line with the interests of all countries and the expectations of the international community. It is also of great significance for maintaining multilateralism and promoting the development of international order in a more just and reasonable direction. As a member of Northeast Asia, China has always upheld the concept of peaceful development and strived to create a harmonious and friendly surrounding environment; always participated in regional cooperation in a constructive attitude in the spirit of mutual respect; always focused on considering and caring for the concerns of all parties and committed to Promote exchanges and dialogue among countries in the region. China is willing to continue to work with all parties to continuously consolidate unity, increase mutual trust, and jointly explore effective ways to maintain lasting and peaceful Northeast Asia, and make unremitting efforts to achieve peace, stability and development in the region. , We must deepen cooperation to achieve mutual benefit and win-win situation for all countries. Northeast Asia is rich in energy resources, has world-leading scientific and technological research and development capabilities, and has sufficient capital and human resources. Each country has its own advantages in economic development, with distinctive characteristics and strong complementarities. At present, the regional situation is stable and improving, and the countries in the region are fully capable and capable of giving full play to their respective advantages and carry out in-depth cooperation in various fields. , We must actively carry out development strategy docking. According to the consensus I reached with President Putin, China and RussiaGive full play to their respective advantages and carry out in-depth cooperation in various fields. , We must actively carry out development strategy docking. According to the consensus I reached with President Putin, China and Russia are actively carrying out the construction of the "Belt and Road" and the docking of the Eurasian Economic Union, which has achieved important early gains. China is willing to connect development strategies with all parties on this basis, strengthen policy communication and coordination, form synergy, and grasp the general direction of cooperation. We must focus on improving the level of cross-border infrastructure interconnection, trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, promoting the market, capital, and technology flow of countries, optimizing resource allocation and industrial structure, jointly building an open regional economy, and striving to build a Northeast Asian economic circle. We must vigorously promote small multilateral cooperation and subregional cooperation. Trilateral cooperation between China, Japan, South Korea, China, Russia and Mongolia has achieved good results. China is open to multilateral cooperation that is conducive to regional stability, development, and win-win cooperation. China is willing to study in depth the possibility of other multilateral and subregional cooperation with all parties, and promote the implementation of more tangible projects. The people bring more benefits. In this regard, China supports the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank and the Silk Road Fund to play a greater role in providing project funding guarantees. , We must learn from each other and consolidate the traditional friendship of the people. The countries in Northeast Asia are geographically close, culturally integrated, and people's hearts shared. People of all countries have forged profound friendships during long-term exchanges, and many moving stories have emerged. The Vladivostok “Ocean” All-Russian Children’s Center has received more than 900 children from the Wenchuan earthquake-stricken area in Sichuan, China. The Chinese children have been cared for by meticulous care here and have formed a deep love with Russia. One of the children named Xi Junfei made a wish, hoping to grow up and study in Russia. The drift bottle with his wish was returned to the staff of the "Ocean" Children's Center after a few months of drifting in the sea. Now his wish comes true, studying at the Federal University of the Far East. This story is a vivid example of friendly exchanges among people in the region. In the future, countries can broaden communication channels and innovate forms of cooperation on the existing basis, consolidate and deepen cooperation in traditional fields such as tourism, youth, education, and cultural industries, and strengthen mutual cooperation in the areas of cultural heritage, co-creation, and intellectual property protection. Learn from each other and strive to create convenience and build a platform for people from all countries and all ages to communicate. , We must focus on the long-term and achieve comprehensive and coordinated development. Countries in Northeast Asia have different development models and levels, rapid economic growth, and many cooperation projects. They need to be based on reality, focus on the long-term, strengthen overall coordination, and achieve coordinated and sustainable development of economy and society, resources and environment, and people and nature. , China is willing to work with countries in the region to actively explore the establishment of a new model for coordinated development in Northeast Asia, accelerate technological innovation, change development concepts, increase comprehensive environmental governance, and form an industrial pattern and lifestyle that conserves resources and protects the environment. Facing regional environmental problems. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! , China is willing to continue to work with countries in the region to seize historical opportunities, follow the trend of the times, strengthen cooperation in the Russian Far East and Northeast Asia, promote the realization of regional diversification and sustainable development, and continue to make the common interest cake bigger so that people in the region Share cooperation opportunities and development achievements, and work together to create a better tomorrow in the Far East and Northeast Asia! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Vladivostok, September 12th), "People's Daily" (September 13, 2018, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Sharing the New Opportunities for the Development of the Far East and Creating a Beautiful New Future in Northeast Asia
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-09-13
text: [, 尊敬的普京总统，, 尊敬的各国同事，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 很高兴时隔8年再次到访符拉迪沃斯托克。首先，我要衷心感谢普京总统的盛情邀请和俄方朋友的周到安排。, 在普京总统亲自倡议下，东方经济论坛已经成功举办3届，成为各方凝聚智慧、共商合作的重要平台。本届东方经济论坛宾朋满座，盛况空前。我谨代表中国政府和中国人民，并以我个人的名义，向普京总统和俄方朋友表示热烈的祝贺！, “东方风来满眼春。”昨天一下飞机，我就被符拉迪沃斯托克的崭新面貌吸引。碧波荡漾的金角湾舳舻相接，俄罗斯岛大桥飞架南北，让我们感受到符拉迪沃斯托克快速发展的景象。, 符拉迪沃斯托克取得的发展成就，是近年来俄罗斯远东地区快速发展的缩影。正如本届东方经济论坛的主题——“远东：更多机遇”，远东地区展现出勃勃发展生机，为各方来这里投资兴业、开展合作提供了新契机。, 中国一直是俄罗斯远东合作的积极支持者和参与者。中俄互为最大邻国，合作地缘优势独特。中俄互为全面战略协作伙伴，两国关系处于历史最好时期，合作政治基础牢固。中国实施区域协调发展战略，加快东北等老工业基地振兴步伐，俄罗斯将远东发展纳入国家发展战略，合作政策保障有力。两国成立中国东北地区和俄罗斯远东及贝加尔地区政府间合作委员会，组建中国东北地区和俄罗斯远东及贝加尔地区实业理事会，举行中俄地方领导人对话会，合作机制完备高效。, 在双方共同努力下，近年来，中方参与俄罗斯远东合作成果显著。2017年，中国同俄罗斯远东联邦区贸易额超过77亿美元。中方参与远东跨越式发展区和自由港项目30余个，规划投资超过40亿美元。中国已经成为俄罗斯远东地区第一大贸易伙伴国和第一大外资来源国。中方已设立首期100亿元、总规模1000亿元人民币的中俄地区合作发展投资基金，愿同俄方一道支持运营好基金，推进重大项目落地，将其打造成为中俄地区合作的重要平台。随着中俄原油管道、东线天然气管道、同江铁路桥、黑河公路桥等一批大项目顺利推进，中俄远东合作将迎来丰收季。, 今明两年是我和普京总统确定的中俄地方合作交流年，为双方远东合作开辟了更加广阔的空间。中方愿同俄方一道努力，拓展基础设施建设、能源、农业、旅游等重点领域合作，广泛调动中小企业积极性，努力提高双方合作技术含量和产品附加值，实现优势互补，互利共赢，推动中俄远东合作取得更多成果。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 新形势下，我们要携手并肩、加强合作，共同促进本地区和平稳定和发展繁荣。我愿提几点看法同大家交流。, 我们要增进互信，维护地区和平安宁。当前，国际形势深刻复杂变化，强权政治、单边主义、保护主义抬头。东北亚地区六国人口占全球人口23%，国内生产总值占全球经济总量19%。一个和睦、互信、团结、稳定的东北亚符合各国利益和国际社会期待，对维护多边主义、推动国际秩序朝着更加公正合理的方向发展也具有重要意义。, 作为东北亚地区一员，中方始终秉持和平发展理念，努力营造和睦友好的周边环境；始终本着相互尊重的精神，以建设性姿态参与地区合作；始终注重考虑和照顾各方关切，致力于推动地区各国交流对话。中方愿继续同各方一道，不断巩固团结，增进互信，共同探索维护东北亚持久和平安宁的有效途径，为实现本地区和平、稳定、发展不懈努力。, 我们要深化合作，实现各国互利共赢。东北亚地区能源资源丰富，具有世界领先的科技研发能力，资金和人力资源充足，各国经济发展各具优势，特点鲜明，互补性强。当前，地区形势稳定向好，地区国家完全有能力、有条件充分发挥各自优势，开展各领域、深层次合作。, 我们要积极开展发展战略对接。根据我同普京总统达成的共识，中俄正在积极开展“一带一路”建设和欧亚经济联盟对接，已经取得重要早期收获。中方愿在这一基础上同各方对接发展战略，加强政策沟通和协调，形成合力，把握合作大方向。我们要重点提升跨境基础设施互联互通、贸易和投资自由化便利化水平，促进各国市场、资本、技术流动，优化资源配置和产业结构，共同建设开放型区域经济，努力构建东北亚经济圈。我们要大力推动小多边合作、次区域合作。中日韩、中俄蒙等三方合作都已取得良好成效。中方对有利于促进地区稳定、发展、共赢的多边合作均持开放态度，愿同各方深入研究开展其他多边和次区域合作的可能性，推动更多实实在在的项目落地实施，给地区人民带来更多实惠。在这方面，中方支持亚洲基础设施投资银行、丝路基金发挥更大作用，提供项目资金保障。, 我们要互学互鉴，巩固人民传统友谊。东北亚各国地缘相近，文化相融，民心相通，各国人民在长期交往中结下深厚友谊，涌现了许多感人故事。符拉迪沃斯托克“海洋”全俄儿童中心曾经接待900多名中国四川汶川地震灾区儿童疗养，中国孩子们在这里受到无微不至的关怀，同俄罗斯结下深厚情缘。其中一名叫席浚斐的儿童许下心愿，希望长大后来俄罗斯读书。装有他心愿的漂流瓶在大海漂流几个月后回到“海洋”儿童中心工作人员手中。现在他的愿望成真，在远东联邦大学就读。这个故事是本地区人民友好往来的生动例证。, 未来，各国可以在现有基础上，拓宽交流渠道，创新合作形式，巩固和深化旅游、青年、教育、文化产业等传统领域合作，同时在文化遗产、共同创作、知识产权保护等领域加强互学互鉴，努力为各国、各年龄段民众开展交流创造便利，打造平台。, 我们要着眼长远，实现综合协调发展。东北亚地区各国发展模式和水平不尽相同，经济增速快，合作项目多，更需要立足现实，着眼长远，加强统筹协调，实现经济和社会、资源和环境、人与自然协调可持续发展。, 中方愿同地区各国一道，积极探讨建立东北亚地区协调发展新模式，加快科技创新，转变发展理念，加大环境综合治理力度，形成节约资源和保护环境的产业格局和生活方式，携手应对共同面临的区域性环境问题。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 中方愿继续同地区国家一道，抓住历史机遇，顺应时代潮流，加强在俄罗斯远东及东北亚地区合作，推动实现本地区多元化、可持续发展，不断做大共同利益蛋糕，使本地区人民共享合作机遇和发展成果，携手开创远东和东北亚更加美好的明天！, 谢谢大家。, （新华社符拉迪沃斯托克9月12日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2018年09月13日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：共享远东发展新机遇 开创东北亚美好新未来

eng: [, Dear President Ramaphosa, Dear President Sale, Dear journalist friends, Ladies and gentlemen: Good afternoon! Nice to meet you all. , First of all, I am happy to announce that the 2018 China-Africa Cooperation Forum Beijing Summit has just concluded successfully! In the past two days, the leaders of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum members gathered in Beijing to review the implementation of the results of the 2015 Forum Johannesburg Summit and plan for China-Africa, focusing on the theme of "win-win cooperation and building a closer community of shared destiny between China and Africa." The future development of the relationship draws a grand blueprint for China-Africa cooperation. The meeting issued the "Beijing Declaration on Building a Closer Community of Destiny for China and Africa", which embodies the consensus of China and Africa on current major international and regional issues, and sends a strong signal to the world that China and Africa go hand in hand. The meeting adopted the "China-Africa Cooperation Forum-Beijing Action Plan", which determined that China and Africa will focus on implementing the "Eight Actions" in the next three years and comprehensively strengthen practical cooperation in various fields. We all agree that the world today is undergoing a major change that has not been seen in a century. The world is multi-polarized and economic globalization is developing in depth. The destiny of peoples of all countries has never been as closely connected as it is today. At the same time, the instability and uncertainty faced by the world is outstanding, and mankind faces many common challenges. We are willing to join hands to jointly create a community of shared destiny between China and Africa with shared responsibility, win-win cooperation, shared happiness, cultural prosperity, safety and harmony, and better safeguard the common interests of China and Africa, and strengthen the strength of developing countries. Let the world we live in become more balanced and beautiful, and set an example for the times to promote the building of a community of human destiny. We agree that China-Africa relations have withstood the test of time and international changes, and have embarked on a road of distinctive win-win cooperation, which is at the best period in history. China and Africa are willing to strengthen strategic coordination and policy coordination, promote China-Africa cooperation in building the “Belt and Road”, and build the “Belt and Road” with the African Union’s 2063 Agenda, the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, and the development strategies of African countries Close connection, focusing on the implementation of the "eight actions" of industry promotion, facilities connectivity, trade facilitation, green development, capacity building, health and hygiene, cultural exchanges, peace and security, provide more opportunities for China-Africa cooperation and add stronger momentum. We agree that China-Africa relations present unprecedented cohesion, vitality, and creativity, which provide important opportunities for China-Africa development. China is the largest developing country, and Africa is the continent with the largest concentration of developing countries. China and Africa will unswervingly strengthen unity and cooperation and move forward together on the road of win-win cooperation and common development. China will continue to uphold the true concept of sincerity and the correct concept of justice and benefit, and work with Africa to draw strength from the profound foundation of China-Africa friendship and mutual trust, grasp the direction in the vigorous momentum of pragmatic cooperation between China and Africa, and promote China-Africa comprehensive strategic partnership. Going deep and going forward We all agree that the realization of development and revitalization is Africa’s due right, which requires the efforts of African countries and people and the support of the international community. China-Africa cooperation is a part of international cooperation with Africa. China-Africa cooperation has always adhered to mutual benefit and win-win results and openness and tolerance. We hope that international partners can learn from each other, give play to their respective advantages, form synergy, and jointly contribute to peace and development in Africa. In cooperation with Africa, all parties in the international community must respect African sovereignty, listen to African opinions, pay attention to African propositions, and honor their commitments to Africa. , The meeting successfully completed the established agenda, and the leaders of China and Africa reached important consensus on all major issues and issued a common voice. The Beijing Summit was a complete success, and it gained heavy results. It opened a new chapter in the history of China-Africa relations and established a new era of South-South cooperation. Taking advantage of the reunion of the China-Africa Friendship Family, Chinese and African leaders have held intensive bilateral meetings in recent days. Some African heads of state and government have also visited China or will soon. I held a bilateral meeting with all the African leaders who attended the Beijing Summit and visited China. They exchanged in-depth views on bilateral relations and issues of common concern and reached broad and important consensus. , China-Africa Cooperation Forum has been established for 18 years. The forum was born in response to the trend of the times, accompanied by China-Africa cooperation, and continued to mature and improve, becoming a banner for international cooperation with Africa and South-South cooperation. The Beijing Summit was successfully held, pushing China-Africa comprehensive strategic partnership to stand at a new historical starting point and starting a new historical journey. We must work together to strengthen the China-Africa Cooperation Forum, fully and efficiently implement the results of the Beijing Summit, and benefit the Chinese and African people with tangible results. , Ladies and gentlemen! , At the end of the Beijing Summit, I sincerely thank the leaders of African countries who attended the summit., Ladies and gentlemen! At the end of the Beijing Summit, I sincerely thank the leaders of African countries who attended the summit. They have worked tirelessly, actively made suggestions, contributed experience and wisdom, and made this summit a complete success! , I am particularly grateful to President Ramaphosa for working closely with me over the past two days to co-chair this summit, and to South Africa for their excellent work during the co-chairing of the forum. I congratulate Senegal on taking over as co-chair of the new forum and thank President Sale for showing his enthusiasm for promoting the development of the forum. , I thank friends from all walks of life from China and Africa, such as industry and commerce, culture, think tanks, and media, for actively participating in and supporting this summit. Thank you, friends from the media, for your comprehensive and timely delivery of the grand event and achievements to the world. I hope you will continue to follow the China-Africa Cooperation Forum and support the development of China-Africa relations. , I believe that with our joint efforts and the active support of more than 2.6 billion Chinese and African peoples, we will work together to build a closer China-Africa community of great destiny and we will surely succeed, and the future of China-Africa relations will be even better! , thank you all. (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 4th), "People's Daily" (September 05, 2018, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech when he met with former heads of state of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-09-05
text: [, 尊敬的拉马福萨总统，, 尊敬的萨勒总统，, 各位记者朋友，, 女士们，先生们：, 　　下午好！很高兴同大家见面。, 　　首先，我高兴地宣布，2018年中非合作论坛北京峰会刚刚圆满落幕！, 　　两天来，中非合作论坛成员方领导人齐聚北京，围绕“合作共赢，携手构建更加紧密的中非命运共同体”主题，回顾了2015年论坛约翰内斯堡峰会成果落实情况，谋划了中非关系未来发展，绘制了中非合作宏伟蓝图。会议发表了《关于构建更加紧密的中非命运共同体的北京宣言》，凝聚了中非双方对当前重大国际和地区问题的共识，向世界传递了中非携手并进的强烈信号。会议通过了《中非合作论坛—北京行动计划》，确定了未来3年中非将以实施“八大行动”为重点，全面加强各领域务实合作。, 　　我们一致认为，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，世界多极化、经济全球化深入发展，各国人民的命运从未像今天这样紧紧相连。同时，世界面临的不稳定性不确定性突出，人类面临许多共同挑战。我们愿携起手来，共同打造责任共担、合作共赢、幸福共享、文化共兴、安全共筑、和谐共生的中非命运共同体，更好维护中非共同利益，壮大发展中国家力量，让我们生活的世界变得更加均衡美好，为推动构建人类命运共同体树立时代榜样。, 　　我们一致认为，中非关系历经时间洗礼和国际风云变幻考验，走出了一条特色鲜明的合作共赢之路，正处于历史最好时期。中非双方愿加强战略对接和政策协调，推进中非共建“一带一路”合作，并将“一带一路”建设同非洲联盟《2063年议程》、联合国2030年可持续发展议程、非洲各国发展战略紧密对接，重点实施好产业促进、设施联通、贸易便利、绿色发展、能力建设、健康卫生、人文交流、和平安全“八大行动”，为中非合作提供更多机遇、增添更强动力。, 　　我们一致认为，中非关系呈现出前所未有的凝聚力、生命力、创造力，为中非各自发展提供了重要机遇。中国是最大的发展中国家，非洲是发展中国家最集中的大陆。中非将矢志不渝加强团结合作，在合作共赢、共同发展的道路上结伴前行。中国将继续秉持真实亲诚理念和正确义利观，同非洲一道，从中非友好互信的深厚底蕴中汲取力量，在中非务实合作的蓬勃势头中把握方向，推动中非全面战略合作伙伴关系向深走实、行稳致远。, 　　我们一致认为，实现发展振兴是非洲的应有权利，需要非洲国家和人民努力，也离不开国际社会支持。中非合作是国际对非合作的一部分，中非合作一贯坚持互利共赢、开放包容。我们希望国际合作伙伴相互学习借鉴，发挥各自优势，形成合力，共同为非洲和平与发展作出贡献。在对非合作中，国际社会各方都要尊重非洲主权，倾听非洲意见，重视非洲主张，兑现对非洲的承诺。, 　　会议顺利完成了既定日程，中非领导人在所有重大问题上都达成重要共识，发出了共同声音。北京峰会取得圆满成功，收获的是沉甸甸的成果，揭开了中非关系新的历史篇章，树立了南南合作新的时代丰碑。, 　　借中非友好大家庭团聚的机会，中非领导人这几天举行了密集的双边会晤，一些非洲国家元首和政府首脑还对中国已经或即将进行访问。我同所有出席北京峰会和访华的非方领导人举行了双边会晤，就双边关系及共同关心的问题深入交换意见，达成广泛重要共识。, 　　中非合作论坛已经成立18年。论坛应时代潮流而生，伴中非合作而兴，不断走向成熟和完善，成为国际对非合作和南南合作的一面旗帜。北京峰会成功举行，推动中非全面战略合作伙伴关系站在新的历史起点上，开启了新的历史征程。我们要共同做实做强中非合作论坛，全面高效落实北京峰会成果，以实实在在的成果造福中非人民。, 　　女士们、先生们！, 　　在北京峰会结束之际，我衷心感谢出席峰会的非洲国家领导人，他们不辞辛劳，积极建言献策，贡献经验和智慧，成就了本次峰会的圆满成功！, 　　我特别感谢拉马福萨总统两天来同我密切合作，共同主持这次峰会，感谢南非在担任论坛共同主席国期间所做的出色工作。我祝贺塞内加尔接任新一届论坛共同主席国，感谢萨勒总统为推动论坛发展表现出的热情。, 　　我感谢来自中非双方的工商、文化、智库、媒体等各界朋友积极参与和支持本次峰会。感谢媒体朋友们，是你们向世界全面、及时传递峰会盛况和成果。希望你们继续关注中非合作论坛，支持中非关系发展。, 　　我相信，在我们共同努力下，在26亿多中非人民积极支持下，我们携手构建更加紧密的中非命运共同体的伟大事业一定会取得成功，中非关系的明天一定会更加美好！, 　　谢谢大家。 , 　　（新华社北京9月4日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2018年09月05日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平同中非合作论坛前任和新任非方共同主席国元首共见记者时的讲话

eng: [, Dear President Ramaphosa, Dear President Temer, Dear President Putin, Dear Prime Minister Modi: First of all, I would like to thank President Ramaphosa and the Government of South Africa for this meeting The thoughtful arrangements made. After five years of separation, the BRICS leaders' meeting once again entered Africa, and it is a matter of celebration. , The theme of this meeting is "Brics in Africa: Conspiracy, Inclusive Growth and Common Prosperity in the Fourth Industrial Revolution", which is of practical significance. From the mechanization of the first industrial revolution in the 18th century, to the electrification of the second industrial revolution in the 19th century, and to the informatization of the third industrial revolution in the 20th century, subversive technological innovations brought great liberation of social productivity The great leap in living standards has fundamentally changed the trajectory of human history. Nowadays, we are experiencing a larger and deeper technological revolution and industrial transformation. Big data, artificial intelligence and other cutting-edge technologies have continuously made breakthroughs, and new technologies, new formats, and new industries are emerging in an endless stream. The interests and destinies of various countries are closely linked and deeply integrated. At the same time, the conversion of new and old kinetic energy in the world economy has not yet been completed, and deep-seated and structural problems such as the imbalance between north and south have not been eliminated. Geopolitical conflicts are emerging one after another, and protectionism and unilateralism are intensifying, which directly affects the external environment for the development of emerging market countries and developing countries. , The tide of the times is running endlessly, and no one's will is transferred. The BRICS countries must grasp the historical trend, deepen strategic partnerships, consolidate the "three-wheel drive" cooperation structure, and make the vision of the second "Golden Decade" a reality, and work together towards the community of human destiny. , First, unleash the enormous potential of economic cooperation. Strengthening economic cooperation and achieving common development is the original intention and main line of BRICS cooperation, and it is also an area with the greatest potential, the richest content, and the most concentrated results. We must strengthen cooperation in trade, investment, finance, interconnection and other fields and make the cooperation cake bigger and more substantial. Within the framework of the United Nations, the G20, and the World Trade Organization, we must firmly maintain the rule-based multilateral trading system, promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, and clearly oppose protectionism. , We must persist in innovation and lead by building new industrial revolution partnerships, strengthening macroeconomic policy coordination, achieving in-depth integration of development strategies, and accelerating the transformation of old and new kinetic energy and the transformation and upgrading of economic structure through mutual efforts. In the next stage, China will implement 10 human resources development cooperation projects, invite experts from the five countries to jointly plan a blueprint for cooperation in the new industrial revolution, and enhance the competitiveness of the BRICS countries and the vast number of emerging market countries and developing countries. Second, firmly maintain international peace and security. Political and security cooperation is an important part of the BRICS strategic partnership. We will continue to hold high the banner of multilateralism, safeguard the purposes and principles of the UN Charter, and urge all parties to abide by the basic norms of international law and international relations, resolve disputes through dialogue, and negotiate differences. It is necessary to give full play to the mechanisms of foreign ministers’ meetings, meetings of high-level representatives of security affairs, and meetings of permanent representatives to the United Nations, make a BRICS voice, propose BRICS plans, and jointly build new international relations of mutual respect, fairness, justice, and win-win cooperation. , Third, deepen the humanities exchanges and cooperation. The five BRIC countries have bred their respective splendid civilizations, and each other shines together, and there is great potential for humanistic exchanges and cooperation. Last year and this year, the BRICS humanities exchanges increased significantly. We will continue to take the people's hearts as the purpose, widely carry out cultural, educational, health, sports, tourism and other fields of humanities exchanges, and build a foundation for BRICS cooperation. China proposes to hold joint activities such as the BRICS Museum, Art Museum, and Library Alliance to strengthen cooperation in the fields of cultural and creative industries, tourism, and local cities, to tell more exciting and exciting BRICS stories, and to continuously enhance mutual understanding and tradition among the people of the five countries. friendship. , Fourth, build a close partnership network. From the beginning of the establishment of the BRICS mechanism, we have jointly determined the correct direction of the road of opening up and tolerance. The Xiamen meeting further established the "BRICS+" cooperation concept, the essence of which is to continuously strengthen the core of unity and cooperation among the five countries and enhance the BRICS centripetal force and cohesion. China has achieved common development and prosperity. We must expand "BRICS+" cooperation within the framework of the United Nations and the G20, expand the common interests and development space of emerging market countries and developing countries, promote the establishment of broad partnerships, and make greater contributions to world peace and development. , Colleagues! The future of the BRICS is in the hands of the people of the five countries. Let us work with the international community to build a world of lasting peace, universal security, common prosperity, openness, tolerance and cleanliness. , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Johannesburg 7Set up a world of lasting peace, universal security, common prosperity, openness, tolerance and cleanliness. , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Johannesburg, July 26th), "People's Daily" (July 27, 2018, 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Make a beautiful vision a reality
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-07-27
text: [, 尊敬的拉马福萨总统，, 尊敬的特梅尔总统，, 尊敬的普京总统，, 尊敬的莫迪总理：, 首先，我要再次感谢拉马福萨总统和南非政府为这次会晤所作的热情周到安排。阔别5年之后，金砖国家领导人会晤再次走进非洲，是一件值得庆祝的事情。, 这次会晤的主题是“金砖国家在非洲：在第四次工业革命中共谋包容增长和共同繁荣”，很有现实意义。从18世纪第一次工业革命的机械化，到19世纪第二次工业革命的电气化，再到20世纪第三次工业革命的信息化，一次次颠覆性的科技革新，带来社会生产力的大解放和生活水平的大跃升，从根本上改变了人类历史的发展轨迹。, 如今，我们正在经历一场更大范围、更深层次的科技革命和产业变革。大数据、人工智能等前沿技术不断取得突破，新技术、新业态、新产业层出不穷。各国利益和命运紧密相连，深度交融。同时，世界经济新旧动能转换尚未完成，南北失衡等深层次、结构性问题还未消除。地缘政治冲突此起彼伏，保护主义和单边主义愈演愈烈，直接影响到新兴市场国家和发展中国家发展外部环境。, 时代大潮奔腾不息，不以任何人的意志为转移。金砖国家要把握历史大势，深化战略伙伴关系，巩固“三轮驱动”合作架构，让第二个“金色十年”的美好愿景变为现实，携手迈向人类命运共同体。, 第一，释放经济合作巨大潜力。加强经济合作、实现共同发展是金砖合作的初衷和主线，也是潜力最大、内容最丰富、成果最集中的领域。我们要加强贸易投资、财金、互联互通等领域合作，把合作蛋糕做大做实。要在联合国、二十国集团、世界贸易组织等框架内，坚定维护基于规则的多边贸易体制，推动贸易和投资自由化便利化，旗帜鲜明反对保护主义。, 我们要坚持创新引领，通过建设新工业革命伙伴关系，加强宏观经济政策协调，实现发展战略深度对接，在相互砥砺中加速新旧动能转换和经济结构转型升级。下阶段，中方将实施10期人力资源开发合作项目，邀请五国专家共同规划新工业革命合作蓝图，提升金砖国家及广大新兴市场国家和发展中国家竞争力。, 第二，坚定维护国际和平安全。政治安全合作是金砖战略伙伴关系的重要内容。我们要继续高举多边主义旗帜，维护联合国宪章宗旨和原则，敦促各方遵守国际法和国际关系基本准则，以对话解争端，以协商化分歧。要充分发挥外长会晤、安全事务高级代表会议、常驻联合国代表会晤等机制作用，发出金砖声音，提出金砖方案，共同构建相互尊重、公平正义、合作共赢的新型国际关系。, 第三，深入拓展人文交流合作。金砖五国孕育出各自灿烂文明，彼此交相辉映，人文交流合作大有可为。去年和今年，金砖人文交流明显提速。我们要继续以民心相通为宗旨，广泛开展文化、教育、卫生、体育、旅游等各领域人文大交流，筑牢金砖合作民意基础。中方建议举行金砖博物馆、美术馆、图书馆联盟联合巡展等活动，加强文化创意产业、旅游、地方城市等领域合作，讲述更多精彩动人的金砖故事，不断增进五国人民相互了解和传统友谊。, 第四，构建紧密伙伴关系网络。金砖机制成立伊始，我们就共同确定了走开放包容之路的正确方向。厦门会晤更确立了“金砖+”合作理念，其要义是在不断强化五国团结协作内核，提升金砖向心力、凝聚力的同时，持续扩大金砖“朋友圈”，同广大新兴市场国家和发展中国家实现共同发展繁荣。我们要在联合国、二十国集团等框架内拓展“金砖+”合作，扩大新兴市场国家和发展中国家共同利益和发展空间，推动构建广泛伙伴关系，为世界和平与发展作出更大贡献。, 各位同事！, 金砖的未来掌握在五国人民自己手中。让我们同国际社会一道，共同建设一个持久和平、普遍安全、共同繁荣、开放包容、清洁美丽的世界。, 谢谢大家。, （新华社约翰内斯堡7月26日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2018年07月27日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平：让美好愿景变为现实

eng: [, Dear colleagues: Qingdao in June, picturesque. At this beautiful time, everyone is welcome to attend the eighteenth meeting of the Council of Heads of State of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization. As early as 2500 years ago, Confucius, a great thinker in ancient China, said, "A friend comes from afar, is it fun?" Today, Shandong, the hometown of Confucius, welcomes guests from all over the world. We are here to discuss Shanghai cooperation Organizational development plan has special significance. In five days, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization will celebrate its 17th birthday. In retrospect, the organization has gone through an extraordinary development process and achieved significant achievements. For 17 years, we have followed the Charter of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization and the Treaty on Long-Term Good-Neighborly Friendship and Cooperation of the Member States of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization to build constructive partnerships that are non-aligned, non-confrontational, and do not target third parties. This is a major innovation in the theory and practice of international relations, creating a new model of regional cooperation and making new contributions to regional peace and development. Today, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization is the world’s most comprehensive and most comprehensive regional cooperation organization. The member countries’ economies and populations account for about 20% and 40% of the world’s total, respectively. The Shanghai Cooperation Organization has 4 observer countries, 6 dialogue partners, and has established extensive cooperative relations with the United Nations and other international and regional organizations. The international influence has continuously increased, and it has become an indispensable part of promoting world peace and development and maintaining international fairness and justice. Important power. The Shanghai Cooperation Organization has always maintained a strong vitality and a strong momentum for cooperation. The fundamental reason is that it creatively proposes and always practices the "Shanghai Spirit", advocating mutual trust, mutual benefit, equality, consultation, respect for diverse civilizations, and seeking common development. This transcends outdated concepts such as conflicts of civilizations, cold war thinking, and zero-sum games. It has opened a new page in the history of international relations and has been increasingly recognized by the international community. , Colleagues! , "Confucius ascended the East Mountain and Xiaolu, climbed the Taishan Mountain and small world". In the face of the new situation of major developments, major changes and adjustments in the world, in order to better advance the cause of human civilization and progress, we must ascend our horizons and correctly understand and grasp the general trend of the world and the trend of the times. Although hegemonism and power politics still exist in the world today, the call to promote the development of the international order in a more just and reasonable direction cannot be ignored, and the democratization of international relations has become an irresistible trend of the times. Despite the continuous emergence of various traditional and non-traditional security threats, the forces that defend peace will eventually defeat the forces that disrupt peace, and security and stability are what people want. Although the trend of unilateralism, trade protectionism, and anti-globalization is constantly showing new manifestations, the world of "global villages" determines the increasing integration of interests, destiny and common interests of all countries, and a win-win cooperation is the general trend. Although the clashes of civilization conflicts and superior civilizations have emerged from time to time, the diversity of civilizations is an inexhaustible driving force for human progress. Exchanges and mutual learning among different civilizations are the common aspirations of people of all countries. , Colleagues! At present, the development of the world is full of hope and challenges. Our future is extremely bright, but the road ahead will not be smooth. We must further promote the "Shanghai Spirit", solve the problems of the times, and resolve the risks and challenges. ——We must promote the innovative, coordinated, green, open and shared development concept, achieve coordinated economic and social progress of all countries, solve the problems caused by uneven development, narrow the development gap, and promote common prosperity. ——We must practice a common, comprehensive, cooperative and sustainable security concept, abandon the Cold War mentality, group confrontation, and oppose sacrificing the security of other countries in exchange for our absolute security to achieve universal security. ——We must uphold an open, harmonious, mutually beneficial and win-win cooperation concept, reject selfish self-interest, short-sighted and closed narrow policies, maintain the rules of the World Trade Organization, support the multilateral trading system, and build an open world economy. ——We must establish a civilization concept of equality, mutual learning, dialogue and tolerance, use civilization exchange to transcend civilization barriers, use civilization mutual learning to transcend civilization conflicts, and civilization coexistence transcend civilization superiority. ——We must adhere to the global governance concept of mutual consultation, joint construction and sharing, constantly reform and improve the global governance system, and promote countries to work together to build a community of shared future for humanity. , Colleagues! The "Shanghai Spirit" is our common wealth, and the Shanghai Cooperation Organization is our common home. Under the guidance of the "Shanghai Spirit", we must continue to work together, cooperate sincerely, work together to build a community of shared destiny in the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, promote the construction of a new type of international relations, and work together towards a world of lasting peace, universal security, common prosperity, openness, tolerance, cleanness and beauty . To this end, I would like to make the following suggestions. , First, gather together a strong force of unity and mutual trust. We want to fully implement the Qingdao Declaration and the implementation outline of the long-term good-neighborly friendship and cooperation treatyWilling to make the following suggestions. , First, gather together a strong force of unity and mutual trust. We must fully implement the Qingdao Declaration and the implementation outline of the long-term good-neighborly friendship and cooperation treaty, respect each other’s chosen development path, take into account each other’s core interests and major concerns, enhance mutual understanding through empathy, promote harmony and unity through seeking common ground while reserving differences, and continuously strengthen the organization’s Cohesion and centripetal force. Second, build a common foundation for peace and security. We must actively implement the cooperation outline for combating the "three forces" from 2019 to 2021, continue to hold "peace missions" and other joint anti-terrorism exercises, and strengthen cooperation in defense security, law enforcement security, and information security. The role of "Shanghai Cooperation Organization-Afghanistan Liaison Group" should be played to promote the process of peace and reconstruction in Afghanistan. In the next three years, China is willing to use the China-Shanghai Cooperation Organization International Judicial Exchange and Cooperation Training Base and other platforms to train 2,000 law enforcement personnel for all parties and strengthen law enforcement capacity building. Third, build a powerful engine for common development and prosperity. We must promote the integration of development strategies, promote the construction of the “Belt and Road” in accordance with the principle of mutual consultation and joint construction, accelerate the process of regional trade facilitation, and step up the implementation of international road transport facilitation agreements and other cooperation documents. China welcomes all parties to actively participate in the first China International Import Expo to be held in Shanghai this November. The Chinese government supports the establishment of a China-Shanghai Cooperation Organization local economic and trade cooperation demonstration zone in Qingdao, and will also establish a "China-Shanghai Cooperation Organization Legal Service Committee" to provide legal support for economic and trade cooperation. , I announced that China will set up a RMB 30 billion equivalent special loan within the framework of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization Banking Consortium. , Fourth, tighten the common bond of cultural exchanges and cooperation. We must actively implement documents such as the environmental protection cooperation concept of member countries, continue to carry out brand projects such as youth exchange camps, and solidly promote cooperation in various fields such as education, science and technology, culture, tourism, health, disaster reduction, and media. In the next three years, China will provide 3,000 human resources development training places for member countries to enhance the public's understanding and recognition of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization family. China is willing to provide meteorological services to all parties using the Fengyun 2 meteorological satellite. Fifth, jointly expand the network of partners for international cooperation. We must strengthen exchanges and cooperation with observer countries, dialogue partners and other regional countries, close partnerships with international and regional organizations such as the United Nations, and carry out dialogues with international financial institutions such as the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank to promote the resolution of hot issues and improve the global Governance contributes. , Colleagues! Over the past year, with the strong support and help of various member states, China has completed the work of the presidency and held this summit. Here, I would like to express my sincere gratitude to everyone. China is willing to work with member states in a spirit of active pragmatism and friendly cooperation to fully implement the consensus of this meeting, support the work of the next chairman, Kyrgyzstan, and work together to create a brighter future for the Organization! , Thank you. , (People's Daily, Qingdao, June 10th), "People's Daily" (June 11, 2018 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech at the 18th meeting of the Council of Heads of State of Shanghai Cooperation Organization
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2018-06-11
text: [, 尊敬的各位同事：, 　　六月的青岛，风景如画。在这美好的时节，欢迎大家来到这里，出席上海合作组织成员国元首理事会第十八次会议。早在2500多年前，中国古代伟大的思想家孔子就说：“有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎？”今天，孔子的故乡山东喜迎远道而来的各方贵宾，我们在这里共商上海合作组织发展大计，具有特殊意义。, 　　再过5天，上海合作组织将迎来17岁生日。抚今追昔，本组织走过了不平凡的发展历程，取得了重大成就。, 　　17年来，我们以《上海合作组织宪章》、《上海合作组织成员国长期睦邻友好合作条约》为遵循，构建起不结盟、不对抗、不针对第三方的建设性伙伴关系。这是国际关系理论和实践的重大创新，开创了区域合作新模式，为地区和平与发展作出了新贡献。, 　　今天，上海合作组织是世界上幅员最广、人口最多的综合性区域合作组织，成员国的经济和人口总量分别约占全球的20%和40%。上海合作组织拥有4个观察员国、6个对话伙伴，并同联合国等国际和地区组织建立了广泛的合作关系，国际影响力不断提升，已经成为促进世界和平与发展、维护国际公平正义不可忽视的重要力量。, 　　上海合作组织始终保持旺盛生命力、强劲合作动力，根本原因在于它创造性地提出并始终践行“上海精神”，主张互信、互利、平等、协商、尊重多样文明、谋求共同发展。这超越了文明冲突、冷战思维、零和博弈等陈旧观念，掀开了国际关系史崭新的一页，得到国际社会日益广泛的认同。, 　　各位同事！, 　　“孔子登东山而小鲁，登泰山而小天下”。面对世界大发展大变革大调整的新形势，为更好推进人类文明进步事业，我们必须登高望远，正确认识和把握世界大势和时代潮流。, 　　尽管当今世界霸权主义和强权政治依然存在，但推动国际秩序朝着更加公正合理方向发展的呼声不容忽视，国际关系民主化已成为不可阻挡的时代潮流。, 　　尽管各种传统和非传统安全威胁不断涌现，但捍卫和平的力量终将战胜破坏和平的势力，安全稳定是人心所向。, 　　尽管单边主义、贸易保护主义、逆全球化思潮不断有新的表现，但“地球村”的世界决定了各国日益利益交融、命运与共，合作共赢是大势所趋。, 　　尽管文明冲突、文明优越等论调不时沉渣泛起，但文明多样性是人类进步的不竭动力，不同文明交流互鉴是各国人民共同愿望。, 　　各位同事！, 　　当前，世界发展既充满希望，也面临挑战，我们的未来无比光明，但前方的道路不会平坦。我们要进一步弘扬“上海精神”，破解时代难题，化解风险挑战。, 　　——我们要提倡创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的发展观，实现各国经济社会协同进步，解决发展不平衡带来的问题，缩小发展差距，促进共同繁荣。, 　　——我们要践行共同、综合、合作、可持续的安全观，摒弃冷战思维、集团对抗，反对以牺牲别国安全换取自身绝对安全的做法，实现普遍安全。, 　　——我们要秉持开放、融通、互利、共赢的合作观，拒绝自私自利、短视封闭的狭隘政策，维护世界贸易组织规则，支持多边贸易体制，构建开放型世界经济。, 　　——我们要树立平等、互鉴、对话、包容的文明观，以文明交流超越文明隔阂，以文明互鉴超越文明冲突，以文明共存超越文明优越。, 　　——我们要坚持共商共建共享的全球治理观，不断改革完善全球治理体系，推动各国携手建设人类命运共同体。, 　　各位同事！, 　　“上海精神”是我们共同的财富，上海合作组织是我们共同的家园。我们要继续在“上海精神”指引下，同舟共济，精诚合作，齐心协力构建上海合作组织命运共同体，推动建设新型国际关系，携手迈向持久和平、普遍安全、共同繁荣、开放包容、清洁美丽的世界。为此，我愿提出以下建议。, 　　第一，凝聚团结互信的强大力量。我们要全面落实青岛宣言、长期睦邻友好合作条约实施纲要等文件，尊重各自选择的发展道路，兼顾彼此核心利益和重大关切，通过换位思考增进相互理解，通过求同存异促进和睦团结，不断增强组织的凝聚力和向心力。, 　　第二，筑牢和平安全的共同基础。我们要积极落实打击“三股势力”2019至2021年合作纲要，继续举行“和平使命”等联合反恐演习，强化防务安全、执法安全、信息安全合作。要发挥“上海合作组织—阿富汗联络组”作用，促进阿富汗和平重建进程。未来3年，中方愿利用中国—上海合作组织国际司法交流合作培训基地等平台，为各方培训2000名执法人员，强化执法能力建设。, 　　第三，打造共同发展繁荣的强劲引擎。我们要促进发展战略对接，本着共商共建共享原则，推进“一带一路”建设，加快地区贸易便利化进程，加紧落实国际道路运输便利化协定等合作文件。中国欢迎各方积极参与今年11月将在上海举办的首届中国国际进口博览会。中国政府支持在青岛建设中国—上海合作组织地方经贸合作示范区，还将设立“中国—上海合作组织法律服务委员会”，为经贸合作提供法律支持。, 　　我宣布，中方将在上海合作组织银行联合体框架内设立300亿元人民币等值专项贷款。, 　　第四，拉紧人文交流合作的共同纽带。我们要积极落实成员国环保合作构想等文件，继续办好青年交流营等品牌项目，扎实推进教育、科技、文化、旅游、卫生、减灾、媒体等各领域合作。未来3年，中方将为各成员国提供3000个人力资源开发培训名额，增强民众对上海合作组织大家庭的了解和认同。中方愿利用风云二号气象卫星为各方提供气象服务。, 　　第五，共同拓展国际合作的伙伴网络。我们要强化同观察员国、对话伙伴等地区国家交流合作，密切同联合国等国际和地区组织的伙伴关系，同国际货币基金组织、世界银行等国际金融机构开展对话，为推动化解热点问题、完善全球治理作出贡献。, 　　各位同事！, 　　一年来，在各成员国大力支持和帮助下，中方完成了主席国工作，并举办了本次峰会。在这里，我向大家表示诚挚的谢意。中方愿同各成员国一道，本着积极务实、友好合作的精神，全面落实本次会议的共识，支持下一任主席国吉尔吉斯斯坦的工作，携手创造本组织更加光明的美好未来！, 　　谢谢各位。, 　　（人民网青岛6月10日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2018年06月11日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平在上海合作组织成员国元首理事会第十八次会议上的讲话

eng: [, Dear President Ramaphosa, Dear Togolese President Faure, Dear Vice President Mabuza, Ministers, Dear friends of industry and commerce, Ladies and gentlemen, friends: PM it is good! It's great to be here again in the "Rainbow Country" and to be with you in the scenic Johannesburg. Five years ago, the first international summit I attended after taking over as China’s president was the fifth meeting of BRICS leaders in Durban. Three years ago, at this conference center, I attended the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation with African leaders. After nearly 3 years, I set foot on the African continent again. I deeply feel the vigorous development and prosperity of the African continent. In September 2017, with the strong support of all parties, China successfully hosted the meeting of the BRICS leaders Xiamen.
